title: Define Project Requirements and Use Cases
description: Gather and document the requirements and use cases for the NeuralNetworkOrchestrationTool.

title: Design Architecture for the Tool
description: Create a high-level design of the NeuralNetworkOrchestrationTool's architecture.
dependencies: Define Project Requirements and Use Cases

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for users to interact with the tool.
dependencies: Define Project Requirements and Use Cases

title: Develop Backend Services for Model Orchestration
description: Build the backend services responsible for orchestrating neural network models in a distributed computing environment.
dependencies: Define Project Requirements and Use Cases

title: Set Up Database for Storing Network Configurations
description: Create a database to store configurations of neural network models and their results.
dependencies: Define Project Requirements and Use Cases

title: Implement DevOps Practices for Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Implement devops practices to ensure continuous integration, testing, and deployment of the tool.
dependencies: Define Project Requirements and Use Cases

title: Perform Quality Assurance Tests on the Tool
description: Test the tool thoroughly to ensure it meets all functional requirements.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Develop Backend Services for Model Orchestration

title: Conduct Security Audit of the Tool
description: Audit the tool to ensure it is secure against potential vulnerabilities.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Develop Backend Services for Model Orchestration

title: Document the Tool's Functionality and Usage
description: Write clear, concise documentation on how to use and configure the tool.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
